structured.description: A man with a bald head and a full, reddish-brown beard is presented from the chest up, wearing formal business attire. He is smiling warmly at the viewer, set against a dark blue background adorned with a glowing, interconnected network pattern. The overall presentation suggests a professional yet friendly individual in a technologically themed environment.
structured.facial_features: Bald head, full reddish-brown beard, light brown eyebrows.
structured.expression: A broad, friendly smile with visible white teeth.
structured.attire: Black suit jacket, white collared shirt, and a bright blue patterned tie.
structured.palette: Dominant colours include dark blue, black, white, and reddish-brown, accented by bright blue and glowing light blue elements.
structured.background: A dark blue background featuring a glowing, interconnected geometric network pattern.

style_profile: neon-lit anime portrait with confident tech leader energy
